name: Orbital Outpost Mechanic
description:
Morning engineer! and welcome to the Arakhis Orbital Station. Take your tools, put on your suit and get ready for a space walk, a ship is waiting for you in the hangar!

Scan and repair space ships, manage your resorces and complete contracts in this retro-futuristic game set in space, where the player moves in zero gravity.

This is a very early demo showcasing the main mechanics and visual aspects of the game as the end of degree project at the ENTI Univeristy in Barcelona.

Made by:

Adrian Armesto

Roger Casajuana

Jonathan Fullola

Miquel Navarro

Arnau Sabater

Rafel Sbert

Music and sound design by:

Xavier Paradis
